Articles.Content:
Another car from me - this time with a V8 engine! Meet the V8 Roadster.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Action group 1 activates the "engine" for visual effects. Action group 2 activates the rocket exhausts, which can propel it up to 60 m/s on full throttle (don't try to go faster, since the wheels will burst). It doesn't have much fuel, but hey, the fuel is mostly there for looks anyway. You can use infinite fuel if you want It also has batteries and RTGs for normal rover wheel drive, as well as a probe core.

Craft file: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/24407836/V8%20Roadster.craft

Edited August 5, 2014 by lunait
